attributes.action: Petition the UN for a humanitarian corridor from Gaza Port to Al-Shifa Hospital
attributes.additional_details:
In short: We want the UK government to urgently petition other member nations of the UN for a humanitarian corridor between Gaza Port and Al-Shifa Hospital to allow movement of medical supplies/patient evacuation

In detail:
http://goo.gl/maps/WAi9s
This is a ~2km or ~6 minute drive but would make a world of difference to affected people and allow crucially needed medicines to be shipped in as well as critically-injured patients who need treatments this hospital cannot provide to be evacuated.

We CAN and SHOULD take action, none of the tit-for-tat matters... people shouldn't be made to suffer like this.
